message.content: Set up a Flask REST API with user authentication

content.text: I'll create a Flask REST API with JWT-based authentication. Let me set up the project structure.
Created app.py with login, register, and protected endpoints. Using bcrypt for password hashing and PyJWT for tokens.

message.content: Add rate limiting to prevent brute force attacks
Added Flask-Limiter with a sliding window strategy. Login endpoint limited to 5 attempts per minute per IP. All other endpoints limited to 100 requests per minute.
Write comprehensive tests for the auth module
Created test_auth.py with 12 test cases covering: successful login, invalid credentials, token expiration, token refresh, rate limit triggering, registration validation, and edge cases.
